Immobili Chiavazza in vendita splendida dimora del ‘600
Dieci camere da letto, quattro bagni, piscina, 1.800 mq: la richiesta è 2.900.000 euro

03 Nov 2019, 10:57

Immobili Chiavazza in vendita splendida dimora del ‘600
Dopo Villa Cernigliaro e la grande villa di via Galileo Galilei, sul sito solobellecase.com compare l’annuncio della vendita di un altro immobile privato di grande valore. Si tratta –  come recita l’annuncio – di “una meravigliosa villa del ‘600 perfettamente rifinita di circa 1.800 mq., ricca di fascino e charme, disposta su tre livelli oltre al seminterrato, con un terreno di 60.000 mq. con piscina, imponenti soffitti a volte, pavimenti in legno e cotto. Composta da: al piano terra ampi saloni con camini in marmo e grandi vetrate con vista sul portico e il giardino, salottino con camino, studio, libreria, pranzo, cucina, tinello, bagno ospiti; al primo piano una master suite con loggia, guardaroba e bagno dedicato, quattro camere con cabina armadio e tre bagni, appartamento indipendente con soggiorno, cucina, studio e camera; al secondo piano due camere, due bagni, angolo cottura, sala biliardo, palestra, sauna, appartamento indipendente con soggiorno, cucina, studio e camera; al piano seminterrato taverna con cucina, pranzo, soggiorno, bagno ospiti, ampia autorimessa, lavanderia, cantine e locali tecnici, classe energetica G (175 kWh/m² anno). Completano la proprietà cascina di circa 500 mq. con portico, casa del custode di circa 100 mq., ampio portico con barbecue e zona relax affacciato sulla piscina”.
La dimora è situata a Chiavazza, in Strada alle Cascine. La richiesta è di 2.900.000 euro.
Per ulteriori informazioni:
https://www.solobellecase.it/ducati_case_srl/62110600GP-villa-biella

Chiavazza properties for sale in a splendid 17th century residence
Ten bedrooms, four bathrooms, swimming pool, 1,800 square meters: the request is 2,900,000 euros

03 Nov 2019, 10:57

Chiavazza properties for sale in a splendid 17th century residence
After Villa Cernigliaro and the large villa on Via Galileo Galilei, the announcement of the sale of another valuable private property appears on the solobellecase.com website. It is - as stated in the announcement - "a marvelous villa of the '600 perfectly finished of about 1,800 square meters, full of charm and charm, arranged on three levels in addition to the basement, with a land of 60,000 square meters. with swimming pool, impressive vaulted ceilings, wooden and terracotta floors. Composed of: on the ground floor large living rooms with marble fireplaces and large windows overlooking the porch and the garden, sitting room with fireplace, study, library, dining room, kitchen, dining room, guest bathroom; on the first floor a master suite with loggia, wardrobe and dedicated bathroom, four bedrooms with wardrobe and three bathrooms, independent apartment with living room, kitchen, study and bedroom; on the second floor two bedrooms, two bathrooms, kitchenette, billiard room, gym, sauna, independent apartment with living room, kitchen, study and bedroom; in the basement tavern with kitchen, dining room, living room, guest bathroom, large garage, laundry room, cellars and technical rooms, energy class G (175 kWh / m² year). The property of about 500 square meters completes the property. with porch, caretaker's house of about 100 square meters, large porch with barbecue and relaxation area overlooking the pool ".
The dwelling is located in Chiavazza, in Strada alle Cascine. The request is 2,900,000 euros.
For more information:
https://www.solobellecase.it/ducati_case_srl/62110600GP-villa-biella
